summary: Costco is a huge American company with membership-only warehouse stores. It's one of the biggest retailers globally, known for selling bulk items like beef, organic food, and wine. Headquartered near Seattle, Costco started in 1983 and now has nearly 900 stores worldwide. It merged with a competitor, Price Club, and offers its own brand, Kirkland Signature. Costco is super popular and ranks high among the largest US corporations.
title: Costco
